meta.name: Flokana-inspired Clean SaaS Landing
meta.purpose: High-level design system spec for reliably reproducing the attached screenshot style across the app.

implementationNotes.themeSwitching: Use class-based theming (e.g. <html class="dark">) with CSS variables; all tokens must exist for both light and dark.
implementationNotes.tailwindFit: This repo uses Tailwind with class-based darkMode. Prefer mapping these tokens into CSS variables used by Tailwind (hsl(var(--...))) or into Tailwind theme extension.
implementationNotes.fontReality: Helvetica Neue is system-native on Apple platforms. For web consistency, use a robust fallback stack (e.g. Inter/DM Sans/system-ui) and treat Helvetica Neue as first-choice when available.

positioning.designIntent: A light, airy SaaS aesthetic with generous whitespace, soft elevation, and a confident blue brand core. Content is calm; CTAs are clear; everything feels modern and credible.
antiGoals: No loud gradients everywhere (use gradients as accents only)
No visual clutter; avoid dense dashboards on marketing pages
No playful, cartoony iconography; keep icons crisp and minimal

designPrinciples.name: Whitespace is a feature
designPrinciples.directive: Prioritize breathing room. Increase section padding before adding decorative elements.

designPrinciples.name: One primary action per viewport
designPrinciples.directive: Make the next step obvious with a single dominant primary button and one secondary option.

designPrinciples.name: Soft structure, sharp typography
designPrinciples.directive: Use subtle borders and shadows for structure; rely on typography hierarchy for clarity.

designPrinciples.name: Consistency beats novelty
designPrinciples.directive: Reuse card patterns, spacing, and radii across components to feel ‘designed,’ not assembled.

designPrinciples.name: Accessible by default
designPrinciples.directive: Hit contrast targets in both themes, preserve focus rings, and maintain readable line lengths.

baseline.rule: All spacing values should be multiples of 4px; default to 8px steps.

contentLineLength.rule: Keep paragraph widths comfortable; center marketing copy within a constrained measure.

marketingPageStructure.header: Slim top navigation with logo left, 4–6 links center, primary CTA right.
marketingPageStructure.hero: Centered headline with gradient-highlighted keyword; short supporting copy; two buttons; product screenshot in a softly elevated frame.
marketingPageStructure.logoStrip: Muted partner logos row; low contrast, small, evenly spaced.
marketingPageStructure.featureGrid: 2–3 rows of small feature cards with icon + title + 1–2 lines of copy.
marketingPageStructure.missionBand: Large statement with light decorative accents; one calm supporting paragraph; single secondary CTA.
marketingPageStructure.caseStudies: 3-up cards with logo, title, excerpt, link; centered section headline.
marketingPageStructure.blogOrArticleFeature: Editorial block with strong headline and 3-up image cards below.
marketingPageStructure.faq: Accordion list, minimal dividers, lots of whitespace.
marketingPageStructure.finalCtaBand: Full-width brand-blue band with centered headline + primary CTA.
marketingPageStructure.footer: Multi-column links with small type; brand mark and social icons; legal line.

heroHeadline.notes: Center-aligned; one keyword may use gradient text.

gradientText.usage: Only for 1–3 words in a headline; never for paragraphs.

rules: Micro-interactions only; no distracting movement on marketing pages.

surfaceLanguage.cards: White (or dark surface) with a subtle 1px border and a soft shadow. Corners are rounded; spacing is generous.
surfaceLanguage.dividers: Use subtle borders instead of heavy lines. Prefer spacing over rules.
surfaceLanguage.background: Very light gray/blue-tinted background to make white surfaces feel premium and dimensional.

iconography.style: Thin-line icons (1.5–2px stroke), minimal detail, rounded line caps.
iconography.color: Default icons use muted text color; highlight icons use brand primary.
iconography.containers: Feature icons sit in a small soft square/circle container with a soft primary background.

imagery.productShots: Presented inside a large rounded frame with subtle shadow and thin border; never hard-edged.
imagery.photos: Editorial, bright, natural light. Avoid oversaturated stock.

decoration.rule: Decorative elements live in the margins at low contrast; never compete with content.

Typography.guideline: Use bold, large headlines and calm body copy. Headings are tight, paragraphs are airy.
do: Use one gradient-highlighted keyword in hero headlines
Use 1–2 lines for feature card titles
dont: Don’t use gradient text for body copy
Don’t compress line-height to fit content

ColorUsage.guideline: Blue is the signal. Everything else is neutral unless communicating status.
ColorUsage.ctaRule: Primary actions use solid brand blue; secondary actions use neutral outlines or subtle fills.
ColorUsage.darkModeRule: In dark mode, surfaces deepen; text becomes cool-white; the brand blue shifts slightly brighter for contrast.

Button.description: Pill-adjacent buttons with crisp label typography and confident contrast.

states.hover: Slight elevation + color shift; no dramatic animation.
states.disabled: Lower opacity; remove shadow; keep readable text.
states.loading: Disable interaction; show spinner left of label.

accessibility.contrast: Primary button must meet WCAG AA for text.

Link.description: Minimal links; underline appears on hover or for inline links in body copy.

Card.description: The primary container pattern: rounded, bordered, softly elevated.

Badge.description: Small rounded pill for labels like ‘New’, ‘Use Case’, ‘FAQ’.

IconButton.description: Square or circular button for small actions; minimal and unobtrusive.

Input.description: Modern form input with thin border and clean focus ring.

states.focus: primary focus ring; border shifts to primary
states.error: danger border + subtle danger ring; message below
states.disabled: muted surface; reduced contrast but readable

Textarea.description: Same styling as Input; default height comfortable for multi-line.

Select.description: Native select or custom select; same field styling; chevron icon.
Select.rule: Dropdown panels should match Card styling.

Checkbox.description: Small square with rounded corners; checkmark is crisp and centered.

Radio.description: Circular control; inner dot uses primary color.

Switch.description: Pill track with thumb; subtle shadows; primary color when on.

Divider.description: Hairline divider; use sparingly; prefer spacing.

Avatar.description: Circular avatar with subtle border; can stack with overlap.

Tooltip.description: Small floating label; subtle elevation; short text.

TopNav.description: Minimal header bar with light border; centered links; primary CTA on right.

MobileNav.description: Hamburger opens right/left sheet; sheet uses Card styling and comfortable spacing.

Breadcrumbs.description: Simple text breadcrumbs; low emphasis; use chevrons.
Breadcrumbs.style: muted text with hover on last or interactive segments

Pagination.description: Rounded pills with minimal borders; primary for active page.

Hero.description: Centered hero with strong headline, subtle badge, and dual CTAs; product screenshot below.
compositionRules: Headline max 2 lines on desktop, 3 on mobile.
Buttons centered and aligned; primary left, secondary right.
Hero media has a light shadow and rounded corners; never edge-to-edge.

LogoStrip.description: Muted partner logos in a single row; low contrast; evenly spaced.

FeatureCardGrid.description: Grid of small cards with icon, title, and short copy.

cardSpec.iconContainer: soft square with subtle primary background
cardSpec.title: cardTitle

gridRules: 2 columns on mobile, 3 on desktop where possible.
All cards equal height for a premium feel.

MissionStatement.description: Large, centered statement with light decorative accents; single secondary CTA.
MissionStatement.rule: Use decoration at the corners/margins only; keep center clean.

CaseStudyCards.description: Three cards, each with logo, title, metric, and link.

EditorialFeature.description: Strong article headline with supporting copy and 3-up photo cards.

FAQ.description: Accordion list with clean dividers and minimal icons.

CtaBand.description: Full-width brand-blue band with centered headline and a single primary CTA.
CtaBand.rule: Keep this section visually simple and high-contrast.

Footer.description: Light footer with multi-column links and subtle separators.

Alert.description: Inline banners for status messages. Subtle backgrounds, clear icons.
Alert.style: Rounded md; 1px border; icon left; short message.

Toast.description: Small transient notifications; matches Card styling; appears bottom-right.

EmptyState.description: Centered icon, headline, short copy, primary CTA.
EmptyState.rule: Use calm, encouraging language; keep visuals minimal.

Loading.description: Skeletons with subtle shimmer; spinners only for short operations.
Loading.skeletonStyle: Muted surface with gentle animated highlight.

Modal.description: Centered dialog with soft shadow and rounded corners.

Drawer.description: Side sheet for navigation or filters; uses surface with subtle border.

Popover.description: Small floating panel for menus; matches Card.
Popover.rule: Keep width narrow and content short.

DropdownMenu.description: Menu list with comfortable item height and hover background.

Table.description: Clean, minimal tables with subtle dividers and generous cell padding.
rules: Avoid heavy zebra striping; use subtle row hover.
Headers are medium weight and muted.

Stat.description: Large number with label; used in cards or strips.

Progress.description: Thin progress bars with rounded ends.

Accordion.description: Used for FAQ and compact disclosures; clean plus/minus icon.
Accordion.rule: One open at a time on FAQ; allow multi-open in settings contexts.

contrast.notes: Primary button text must pass AA; muted text must remain readable on light and dark surfaces.

focus.rule: Never remove focus outlines. Use a consistent brand-tinted ring on interactive elements.
focus.style: Use tokens.shadows.*.focusRing + a subtle border color change.

motion.rule: All non-essential animation must reduce/disable under prefers-reduced-motion.

touch.spacing: Do not pack tap targets; add vertical rhythm instead.

checklist: All components use the same radii family (md/lg/pill) and soft shadows.
Primary CTA always uses brand blue; secondary actions are quiet.
Marketing pages feel airy: section padding is generous and consistent.
Typography hierarchy is obvious without relying on color.
Light and dark themes both feel intentional (not inverted).
